sys_update_xml.name: sys_email_07f9178283c322107f446c86ccda1efd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><span style="font-size: 14pt;">A new urgent incident has been assigned to your group:</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 14pt;">Number: INC0010003</span><br><span style="font-size: 14pt;">Short Description: Urgent: Help needed with network</span><br><span style="font-size: 14pt;">Priority: 1 - Critical</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 14pt;">Caller: Thomas Jefferson</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 14pt;">Caller Name: Thomas Jefferson</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 14pt;">Description: </span></p>

<br><br>
